headline: Interesting place to work for
pros: Plenty of free time to pursue personal interest
cons: Company and industry is losing competitiveness to Exchange Traded Funds

headline: Small Fund Family
pros: Good place, great people.  Had plenty of opportunity to take on new responsibilities and learn new things.  The people I worked with were very professional and I;m still i touch with most.
cons: the atmosphere was tainted by the AIG mess.  A small infrastructure that sometimes limited the amount of exposure, but no too small where you got none.
